caption: Amazing. Don't waste your time with cioppino anywhere else, this place is so good! There was a line outside when I went, but I was there alone (score one for work travel!) so I was seated at the bar rather promptly. If you have to wait, I saw them offering wine to drink while you waited, which is nice! The food was just so fresh and tasty, my mouth is watering just thinking about it.

Great food. Everything we had was fabulous. Beyond the food though the service was outstanding. Our server was friendly and professional. Everyone we encountered was the same. Great menu, I highly recommend Torali.
Mmmm..nuff said.
Excellent service, excellent food!!
Tasty food.  Great service!  Good ambiance!  Tira misu best I've had!
Our servers Rod, Albert and Edgar Are the best of the best! Excellent service all around. Thank you for you attentiveness and recommendations. Food was delicious! Highly recommended. Will be back
The meals and service were above our expectations. I really liked the vibes of this restaurant. First-rate spot to take the family out for dinner.
Good place to eat something quickly. It's a little bit expensive
You don't have to leave the comfort of the building to get sustenance. Morning, noon, or, night it's superb!
Amazing food, and even better service
Nice clean place , fresh profuce served
It was a refreshing break from the crowds on Michigan Ave. The service was friendly and creative.
Great food...great service!
Its is festive and current and outstanding service!
Great Service but food was subpar
We went to brunch and the while there food was good the service was exceedingly slow
Love it 😍
Awesome meat!

The service is indulgent.  Every need is met.
Had the salmon for lunch and every bite was delicious!
Great location and vista overlook from the 12th floor. They have a good coffee bar!

(Translated by Google) The steak is really delicious. Side menu such as boiled asparagus or deep-fried onion is also delicious. Dessert is delicious (Supre) 30 minutes before you order it should be ordered together with the main  (Original) 스테이크 정말 맛있네요. 아스파라가스 삶은 거나 어니언튀김 등 사이드메뉴도 맛있습니다. 디저트 맛있다 하던데(수프레) 30분 전에 주문해야 한다니 메인시킬때 같이 주문해야할 듯
Good atmosphere very good service and a very good food
Great services. Food is exceptional especially the dry aged steak ♥︎
Good

We enjoyed Father's Day at Torali. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had a fantastic experience. The food was very good. The waffles and pancakes are excellent, but keep in mind the portions are large. The avocado toast was a delicious masterpiece! I highly recommend this restaurant if your looking for a relaxing and delicious venue. Children are also welcomed at Torali.
Food authentic
Great food and service, very elegant! Expensive though.
Amazing service and food as always!
Food is exceptional.
Great French onion soup, and a fantastic steak for two.
Absolutely a delight. Can't wait to go back.
Best food in Chicago! Service was great, food and portions were perfect! Will definitely come back next time in Chicago!
Food was bland and sub-par / service was excellent.
i love meat of lamb and loin.  This not luxury place but the food is luxury taste
Great place to hang out!
Had prime.rib absolutely delicious and service.was.great.
Good food for a hotel restaurant on the expensive side I'll be back probably in a year or so there are better choices for less money in the neighborhood but overall not bad

My first time here was in 2008 I have to say one of the best steak house I have ever been to and now it's one of my favorites. I come here to celebrate birthdays and anniversaries any celebration I can think of just to come to this place. The service is super. Love their Kobe steak! It just melts in your mouth.

Just ate here.  Both the food and the service were horrible.  Ordered a chicken soup - had huge pieces of dry, tough, mealy chicken - only about a dozen noodles, all of which were undercooked, almost crunchy.  Oh - and no waiter following up to see if my soup is ok.  No one even asked if it was ok when they took away the bowl, which was 2/3 uneaten.  Then had the American Wagyu, medium rare - can't mess that up, right?  They did.  The meat wasn't undercooked, it was RAW.  And not seasoned at all.  I am used to getting meat cooked rare when I order med-rare - I can handle that, but this simply was inedible.  Finally, a waiter (not mine) walks by and notices that I am not eating and asks if it is ok.  They offered to take the food back to be cooked more, but honestly I just needed to leave after such a lousy experience.  After all that I still had to ask for the check three times before they finally brought it.  I will NEVER eat here again.

Excellent service, beautiful presentation, unique dishes that allow the fresh ingredients to shine and are not loaded with salt.  All together, it was very romantic and luxurious. Unfortunately, we found the wine menu to be remarkably over priced although the Somm was willing to negotiate. (The wine menu was organized by flavor profile, not region). It took longer than expected for the wine to show up; not sure where this cellar is.  The entire team worked seamlessly as a group and the service was impeccable.  This experience was definitely for a special occasion when you’re not worried about prices.  Can’t wait to go back as the food was nothing I’ve had before even though it’s lauded as Italian cuisine.
One of the best lamb shanks I’ve ever had. I was pleasantly surprised. Great food overall.

Good location in the Ritz Carlton. Nice setting and good service There was a private party with loud speakers turning the place into an airport terminal  However the Food was simply terrible  Expected more for  a $ 470 dinner for 3 of us Don’t mind paying for a $16 endives salad...not when there was almos all lettuce and barely a couple of endives leaves  The mushroom risotto was way too sweet and never had all the mushrooms on one side of the plate and the risotto on the  other side...looked nice but did not taste the way a nice and expensive risotto should taste
Visiting from Detroit. Fantastic food and the food was amazing. Thank you, Robert, for your incredible hospitality and suggestions! We had the bruschetta, eggplant, lamb loin, and tiramisu 😍
Food is great. Service is fantastic!
Absolutely great. The food was so good. I ordered off the menu (Lobster Tail) and the Chef came out to personally take me order. Ahmad our server was phenomenal. We had a great time.

(Translated by Google) Torali ‘’ A Chicago cocktail at the posh please ’’ Enjoy a privileged visit of the magnificent ’magnificent mile’ ’from the twelfth floor from the picturesque and modern hotel bar Ritz-Carlton.  You will find a great variety of cocktails and international drinks.  You will not be paying for the best drink of your life but if for a space and a privileged view.  Definitely a highly recommended stop on your visit to Chicago #Chicago #ritzcarlton #posh #chicagoposh #torali #watertower #zibaryta  (Original) Torali ‘’Un cocktail de Chicago a la posh por favor’’ Disfruta una visita privilegiada de la ‘’magnificent mile’’ desde el doceavo piso del pintoresco y moderno bar del hotel Ritz-Carlton.  Encontrarás una gran variedad de  cocktails y bebidas internacionales.  No estarás pagando por la mejor bebida de tu vida pero si por un espacio y una vista privilegiada.  Sin duda una parada ampliamente recomendada en tu visita a Chicago #Chicago #ritzcarlton #posh #chicagoposh #torali  #watertower #zibaryta
